Articles.Content:
Story Begin.

In the year 2318, Kerbalkind became desperate. After the deaths of Jeb, Bill and bob, Wernher von Kerman was forced to do something strange, and totally unexpected.

After he logged 27 flights, it was time to go back to the Mun.

However, little did he know this would be his undoing, An encounter with THE KRAKEN!

To be continued.

Sorry for the incredible smallness of this, this is my first story.
I somehow already know how this ends...
I moved this to a more appropriate forum. Please continue with your work; take pictures!
Something tells me to make this into a big series.
